ActBank Act
Insurance Companies Act
Trust and Loan Companies Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY STATEMENTS (BANKS, INSURANCE COMPANIES, TRUST AND LOAN COMPANIES) REGULATIONS to reflect the amendments to the Bank Act by Bill C-37 in which The Public Accountability Statements Regulations set out the core information that must be reported in each Public Accountability Statement, as well as the manner and timing for the disclosure of these statements to the public and for filing with the FCAC.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0040 Publication Date: 2009-03-04
